sourcesContent:
/** @format */ import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { Grid, Box, FormLabel, FormControlLabel, Radio, RadioGroup, FormControl, Checkbox, Typography, TextField, Table, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, TableCell, } from "@mui/material"; import SaveIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Save"; import { LocalizationProvider, DateRangePicker } from "@mui/lab"; import AdapterDateFns from "@mui/lab/AdapterDateFns"; import { useToggle } from "../../context/useToggle"; const PaymentPlan = () => { return ( Invoice Due Tax Interest Time Hard Soft Total
); }; const InvoicePayment = () => { return ( Payment # Due Amout Late Fee Total Due Payment Posted Method
); }; const Payment = () => { const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState([null, null]); const [isPlan, setIsPlan] = useToggle(false); const [invoiceData, setInvoiceData] = useState({ payment_type: "", date: "", retainer: "", payment: "", date_range: "", menu: "", bank_account: "", payment_method: "", }); const { payment_type, date, retainer, payment, date_range, menu, bank_account, payment_method, } = invoiceData; const onChange = (e) => setInvoiceData({ ...invoiceData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; return ( onSubmit(e)} > onChange(e)} id="payment_type" autoComplete="payment_type" > } label="Cash" /> } label="CC" /> } label="Wire" /> } label="Check" /> } label="Retainer" /> } label="Payment" /> Date Range { setDateRange(newValue); }} renderInput={(startProps, endProps) => ( to )} /> onChange(e)} id="menu" autoComplete="menu" /> onChange(e)} id="bank_account" autoComplete="bank_account" /> onChange(e)} id="payment_method" autoComplete="payment_method" /> setIsPlan(e)} id="isPlan" autoComplete="isPlan" > } label="Invoice Payment" /> } label="Payment Plan" /> {isPlan ? : } ); }; export default Payment;
